data.message: @facebook your help support sucks...i been tryin to contact or get help for the last couple of weeks ....and no one has contacted me yet....you guts need to get better or open up a call center cus you guys are not very good at helpin out

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Antoine. Let us know how we can help. -Joe

I have another account that ive been tryin to access and been asking for help support to assist me but i never can get the help i wanted ...my music page TWAN MAC has been hacked or something i can get into it ro change password because of the old email address i will attach a pic of the profile pic...you can also compare to see that i am the same person ...i just need a link sent to my updated email so i can change password to access my profile
I sent a pic of my other profile in the facebook inbox

Hi Antoine. You may be able to get back into the Facebook account you are currently unable to access by answering a security question, using an alternate email address listed on your account or getting help from friends. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2dX7nEs. -Joe

Ive tried all the above ....all i need if possible is a reset password link to my other email....thts all ive tried all tht i can ...i wouldn't hve posted a negative comment about the help center if i had got into it but all im gettin is a bunch of b s and the run arounds thts all ....
Just like you attatched the link in the comment ....is hard to attach a reset link to my available email tht im giving you
I totally understand that, I needed their help & it said they would get back with , total waste of time ...I ended up . Figuring out after sleepless night doing it myself ...faster results ..💔👎🎃🎃😬😉
The problem is that this is my ID, I've asked a lot of friend Request on Facebook, they want to cancel.
